ucpisection_header: Lacag-bixinnada Unified ee Interface (UCPI) waa interface gaar ah oo ah in Paycio uu horumariyey si uu ugu suurto geliyo xawaaladaha aan xadka ahayn.
ucpisection_line: Caawinadeeda, isticmaaleyaashu waxay isweydaarsan karaan guryo badan oo ka mid ah hal garoon.
ucpisection_uniqline: Paycio kaliya maahan bixinta lacagaha ee 'Crypto'.
ucpisection_uniqline2: Waxa kaliya ee aad u baahan tahay waa lambar taleefan.
ucpisection_header2: Ansixinta aqoonsiga ee ku saleysan lambar taleefan
ucpisection_line1: PayCio si isdaba joog ah ayaa iskudhafaneysaa is-kala-baxa kala duwan, taasoo u oggolaanaysa in lacag deg deg ah oo wax ku ool ah oo ku saabsan ku wareejinta lacagaha oo dhan.
ucpisection_line2: Madaxayagu wuxuu fududeeyaa geedi socodka dusha sare iyo xaqiijinta KYC.
ucpisection_line3: Qalabkayaga, waxaad fursad u heli kartaa astaamaha noocan oo kale ah bixinta lacagaha fudud, xawaaladaha facooyinka, xawaaladaha laf-dhabarka, jadwalka bixinta, iyo wareejinta silsiladda.
ucpisection_line4: Paycio wuxuu abuuraa xalka midaysan ee wax looga qabanayo dhibaatada ku saabsan adeegyada 'Crypto' iyo in la wanaajiyo waayo-aragnimada guud ee adeegsadaha, oo ay ku jiraan C2C, iyo xalalka B2C, iyo B2C ee ganacsatada.
ucpisection_needheader: Ku biirista xulashooyinka lacag bixinta kala duwan
ucpisection_needline: Qiyaas inaad leedahay farabadan boorsooyin ah lacagaha kaladuwan - rupees, doolar, rubles, iyo inbadan.
ucpisection_needline1: Waxaan wax ka qabanaa qalalaasaha aan ku nasiici laheyn boorsooyinka kala duwan ee boorsooyinka, guryaha, adeegyada, iyo isdhaafsiga.
ucpisection_needline2: Paycio wuxuu fududeeyaa bixinta bixinta ee 'Crypto' si loo wanaajiyo korsashada tirada badan ee teknolojiyadda kexada.
ucpisection_needline3: Waxaan u fududeynaa howlaha KYC si aan uga caawino isticmaaleyaasha inay si dhakhso leh u gudubto xaqiijinta aqoonsiga iyagoo raacaya shuruudaha sharciyeynta iyo kobcinta kalsoonida.
ucpisection_needline4: Qalabkayagu wuxuu ballaarinayaa awooda bixinta lacag bixinta wuxuuna ka dhigayaa nidaamka oo dhan inuu u dabacsanaado ganacsiyada iyo shaqsiyaadka.
ucpisection_participantsline1: Madaxayagu wuxuu ku habboon yahay kooxo badan oo macaamiisha ah, sida:
ucpisection_partheader1: Ganacsiyada ku dhex dari kara aaladda lacag bixinta ee 'Crypto' hanaankooda
ucpisection_partheader2: Dowladaha si fudud ula socon kara qulqulka ganacsiga ganacsiga
ucpisection_partheader3: Xirfadlayaashu waxay helayaan xalka fudud ee loo hoggaansamo xisaabinta
ucpisection_partheader4: U-isticmaalidda dhamaadka-dadka ee maalgasha ku ah Crypto ama waxay rabaan inay isticmaalaan hantidooda dhijitaalka ah inta ay wax iibsanayaan
ucpisection_partliner: Moodo kala duwan oo lagu dhajinayo madal.
ucpibenefits_line: Mas'uuliyiinta, UCPI waxay u taagantahay sidii gacan ku caawineysa.
ucpibenefits_line1: Sababo la xiriira macaamil ganacsi oo hufan, UCPI waxay leedahay suurtagalnimada uruurinta aruurinta sare.
ucpibenefits_line2: Teknolojiyaddeennu waxay siisaa qaybo aan loo baahnayn oo muwaadiniin ah oo leh adeegyo lacageed iyagoo adeegsanaya xaqiijinta aqoonsiga fudud.
ucpibenefits_line3: Waxaan dhisnaa bey'adda 'Crypto' ee kobcaya ee ku nool Deegaanka, oo soo jiidaneysa maalgashadayaasha iyo hal-abuurka adduunka oo dhan.
ucpibenefits_line4: UCPI waxay awood u siineysaa kormeer wax ku ool ah oo ah macaamil ganacsi oo dheeraad ah, oo wax ka qabanaya welwelka sharciyeynta ee ku saabsan howlaha sharci darrada ah.
ucpibenefits_insightsline: UCPI waxay u dhaqmeysaa sidii buundo isku xira jardiinooyin kaladuwan oo hal qol ah, oo saadaalineysa adeegsiga 'Crypto', dhaqso, iyo xasilloon.
ucpibenefits_insightsline1: UCPI waxay caqabad ku tahay adeegyada xawilaadaha dhaqameed iyagoo fududeynaya bixinta xadka ee xadka iyo yareynta kharashaadka.
ucpibenefits_insightsline2: Iyada oo ah madal bixinta guud ee P2P ee caalamka, Paycio wuxuu taageeraa lacageedyo kala duwan oo Fiat ah.
ucpibenefits_insightsline3: UCPI ayaa ujeedadeedu tahay in ay carqaladeyso nidaamyada lacag-bixinta dhaqanka iyadoo la siinayo dhaqso, ka raqiisan, iyo in ka badan oo aamin ah.

referfaq_header1: Maxaa ku dhacaya qadaadiicda haddii aan ku biiro iyada oo aan loo dirin?
referfaq_header2: Waa maxay sababta qadaadiicda loo soo gudbiyo koontada shirkadda si caadi ah?
referfaq_header3: Ma jiraa sabab cayiman oo qadaadiicda ah ee loo tago koontada shirkada si caadi ah?
referfaq_header4: Sideen ula xiriiraa Taageerada si loo caddeeyo ama gargaar dheeraad ah?
referfaq_header6: Sideen uga qeybqaataa Abaalmarinta Barnaamijka Macaamilka?
referfaq_content1: Sida caadiga ah, haddii aad ku biirto iyada oo aan loo dirin, qadaadiicdaada waxaa loo gudbin doonaa koontada shirkadda.
referfaq_content2: Dejintaan caadiga ah waxay gacan ka geysataa maamulka calaamadaha calaamadaha oo hubiya daahfurnaanta nidaamka qoondaynta.
referfaq_content3: U wareejinta shirkadda ee loogu talagalay koontada shirkadda waxaa loogu talagalay in lagu dhexeeyo qarashka qadaadiicda ah ee loo yaqaan 'Coin', oo u oggolaanaya raadraaca hufan iyo ka-faa'iideysiga qadaadiicda ujeeddooyin kala duwan, sida horumarka mashruuca, dadaallada bulshada, iyo isbadalka madaxda bulshada.
referfaq_content4: Wixii su'aalo ama walaac ah ee ku saabsan qoondaynta token, barnaamijyada gudbinta, ama arrimaha la xiriira, fadlan la xiriir kooxdayaga taageerada ee kanaalada loo qoondeeyay ee lagu soo bandhigay madal.
referfaq_content5: Abaalmarinta Barnaamijka Macaamilku waa dadaal gaar ah oo bixiya isticmaaleyaasha dadka isticmaala oo ku saleysan tirada macaamil ganacsi ay qabaan.

termsconditions_line2: Shuruudahan iyo shuruudahan ('Shuruudaha') ayaa xukuma isticmaalkaaga adeegyada bixinta mushaharka PayCocurrency ('Adeegyada').
termsconditions_line4: Barnaamijka Paycio App wuxuu fududaynayaa geedi socodka ku wareejinta lacagaha iyadoo la adeegsanayo nambarka mobilada, taasoo u oggolaaneysa macaamil sahlan oo leh tuubbada fudud ee qalabkaaga mobilada.
termsconditions_line5: Aasaaska khibradaha Paycio waa lacag-bixiyaha midaysan ee Crypto (UCPI).
termsconditions_line6: UCPI waxay si otomaatig ah u haysaa hantida dijitaalka, taageeraya macaamiisha-to-macaamiisha (C2C), ganacsi-ganacsi (B2B), iyo is-dhexgalka ganacsiga (B2C).
termsconditions_line7: Adigoo kaashadaya UCPI, PayCio wuxuu hubiyaa inuusan ahayn oo keliya hantida dijital ah ee wax ku oolka ah laakiin sidoo kale aamin ah lacagaha ganacsiga iyo ansaxinta aqoonsiga iyada oo loo marayo lambarrada mobilada.
termsconditions_line9: Paycio waxay adeegyo siisaa lacag-bixinnada qiimeynta.
termsconditions_line10: Sababo la xiriira dabeecadda kacsan ee suuqa cryptorcurrences, waxaan kula talinaynaa kuwa wax iibsada si ay si buuxda u fahmaan khataraha ku lugta leh.
termsconditions_line12: Shuruudahan ganacsatada ah (Shuruudaha ') ayaa xukuma isticmaalkaaga wax soo saarka Paycio, adeegyada, iyo astaamaha kale ee la xiriira adeegyada aqbalaadda lacag-bixinta ee ganacsatada (adeegyada aqbalaadda').
termsconditions_line13: Adigoo adeegsanaya adeegyada aqbalaadda websaydhka Paycio, API, ama mid kale oo dhexdhexaad ah, adiga ('' ganacsi ',' adiga 'ama') ')') ') Waan oggolahay in lagu xidho shuruudahan.
termsconditions_line15: PayCio waxay u hogaansameysaa dhammaan sharciyada iyo qawaaniinta Mareykanka ee lagu dabaqayo Sharciga Sirta ee Bangiga iyo Ganacsiga oo ay maamusho Xafiiska Khasnadda Diyaaradda ee Mareykanka (ATL) iyo Anti-Padenyading (ATF) iyo Anti-Padent (ATF).
termsconditions_line16: Paycio waa ganacsi adeeg lacageed oo diiwaangashan oo leh shabakadda maaliyadeed ee maaliyadeed (FinCEN) ee Waaxda Maaliyadda Mareykanka ee Mashruuca Mareykanka waxaana ruqsad u leh sidii ay u gudbiyihii ku yaalliin gobolada u baahan shati shati u baahan.
termsconditions_line17: Intaa waxaa sii dheer, Paycio wuxuu la jaan qaadayaa qawaaniinta Dutch-ka iyo EU-da, oo ay kujirto Sharciga Dutch-ka ee ka-hortagga maalgelinta lacagta la dhaqay iyo argagixisada ('WWFT' iyo xayiraadda 'Holtch') iyo Qiyaasta Dutch-ka (
termsconditions_line19: Adigoo adeegsanaya adeegyada Paycio, waxaad ogolaatay inaad u hogaansanaato shuruudahan iyo wixii sharciyo ama qawaaniin lagu dabaqi karo.
termsconditions_line21: Shuruudahan waxaa xukuma shuruucda [galinta xukunka], iyo wixii khilaaf ah ee ka yimaada shuruudahan waxaa lagu qaadi doonaa awooda gaarka ah ee maxkamadaha ku jira [geli xukunka].
termsconditions_line23: Waxaad matalaysaa oo u baahan tahay:
termsconditions_line24: Shakhsiga aqbala shuruudahan isagoo ku hadlaya magaca baayacmushtarka waa da 'sharciyeed wuxuuna leeyahay awooda lagama maarmaanka u ah inuu xidho ganacsatada.
termsconditions_line25: Hay'addaada ganacsiga ayaa loo abaabulay, oo si sax ah u jira, oo si wanaagsan u jira, iyada oo la raacayo shuruucda gobolka iyo waddanka, oo ay si wanaagsan u taagan tahay xukunka kasta oo ay ka mid tahay dhaqanka ganacsigu u baahan yahay inuu noqdo.
termsconditions_line26: Waqtiga aad ku raacsan tahay shuruudahan, ma tihid macmiil sida lagu qeexay oo loo isticmaalo Xeerka Kormeerka Maaliyadeed ee Dutch-ka (Op op op hit hibesal toezicht) iyo nambarka madaniga ah ee Dutch (Burgerlijk dhulka qoyan).
termsconditions_line27: Waa inaad hubisaa in isticmaalka adeegyada aqbalitaanka uusan ku xadgudbin wax kasta oo lagu dabaqi karo wax caalami ah, federaal, dowlad goboleed, ama xeerar maxalli ah ama qawaaniin ah oo ay kujiraan sharciyada cashuuraha.
termsconditions_line28: Dhammaan macluumaadka aad na siisay, oo aad noo siin karto mustaqbalka, waa oo ay sii wadi doonaan inay run sheegaan oo dhameystiraan.
termsconditions_line30: Waad oggol tahay inaadan ka qeybgalin adeegsiga soo socda ee la mamnuucay inta aad isticmaaleyso adeegyada aqbalaadda ama la macaamilka isticmaaleyaasha kale ama qaybaha saddexaad.
termsconditions_line31: Haddii aadan hubin in isticmaalka adeegyada aqbalitaanka ay ku hoos dhacaan qaybahaas ama aad wax su'aalo ah ka qabtid sida xeerarkan ay kuugu dabaqaan, fadlan noo soo dir
termsconditions_line33: Ku lug yeelashada ficillada ku xadgudba ama gacan ka geysta ku xadgudubka sharci kasta, qaynuun, ama sharciyeyn, ama sharciyeyn, ama sharciyeynta xilka xasaasiyadda ee la adeegsan karo Xafiiska U.S.

faq_pricing_q1: Waa maxay ajuuradaada macaamil xawaaladdu sideese isbarbar dhigaan hababka lacagaha dhaqameedyada?

faq_pricing_q1_a3_highlight_item1: Majiro khidmad bille ah oo loogu talagalay heerarka aasaasiga ah iyo kuwa dhexdhexaadka ah
faq_pricing_q1_a3_highlight_item2: Ma jiro khidmad dejin ah oo loogu talagalay is dhexgalka caadiga ah

faq_pricing_q2_a2_list_item1: U hoggaansanaanta aasaasiga ah iyo kormeerka halista

faq_technical_a1: Waa maxay xulashooyinka is dhexgalka ee aad bixiso iyo midkee ku habboon ganacsigeyga?
faq_technical_q1_a1_paragraph: Paycio waxay bixisaa seddex habab is-dhexgal oo waaweyn oo lagu haqabtiro baahiyaha ganacsi ee kala duwan:
faq_technical_q1_a3_highlight_item0: Static QR: Kufiican kafateeriyada, dukaamada tafaariiqda oo leh qiime go'an
faq_technical_q1_a3_highlight_item1: DYNAMIC QR: Ku habboon makhaayadaha, ganacsatada adeegga ee leh qiimeyaal doorsoomayaal ah
faq_technical_q1_a3_highlight_item2: In-app: ugu fiican ganacsatada dijitaalka ah, barnaamijyada mobilada, sifiican ux
faq_technical_q1_a3_highlight_item3: Waxaa loo baahan yahay caqli gal ganacsi oo adag, astaamaha ganacsiga
faq_technical_a2: Ma u baahanahay khibrad farsamo oo aan ku dhexgalo mushaharka?
faq_technical_q2_a1_paragraph: Shuruudaha farsamada waxay ku kala duwan yihiin nooca is dhexgalka:
faq_technical_q2_a2_list_title: Ma jiro khibrad farsamo oo loo baahan yahay:
faq_technical_q2_a2_list_item0: Koodhadhka Static QR: Nuqul ka fudud oo ka mid ah QR Sawirka QR
faq_technical_q2_a2_list_item1: Bogagga lacag bixinta ee martida loo yahay: Kaliya macaamiisha dib ugu dhig Paycio
faq_technical_q2_a2_list_item2: Pluo Commo Commerce Pluqunta: Hal-guji rakibaadda loogu talagalay aaladaha caanka ah
faq_technical_q2_a3_list_title: Xirfadaha farsamada ee aasaasiga ah ee loo baahan yahay:
faq_technical_q2_a3_list_item0: Xeerarka QR Codes: WebHook fudud oo loo maareeyo ogeysiisyada
faq_technical_q2_a3_list_item1: Is dhexgalka API: nasashada aqoonta API, barnaamijyada aasaasiga ah
faq_technical_q2_a3_list_item2: XUQUUQDA XUQUUQDA: Awooda horumarineed ee horumarsan
faq_technical_q2_a4_list_item3: Tusaalooyinka koodhka iyo waxqabadka ugu wanaagsan
faq_technical_a3: Waa maxay aps iyo sdks aad bixiso?
faq_technical_q3_a1_paragraph: Paycio wuxuu bixiyaa aalado horumarineed oo dhameystiran iyo maktabado:
faq_technical_q3_a2_codeblock: // Tusaale ahaan: Abuuritaanka lacag bixinta Paycio Api
faq_technical_q3_a3_highlight_item0: JavaScript / NODE.Js: Dhameystiran SDK oo leh taageerada
faq_technical_q3_a3_highlight_item1: Python: Maktabad buuxa oo leh taageero async ah
faq_technical_q3_a3_highlight_item2: PHP: Cudurka iyo aaminka isku-dhafka ah ee la heli karo
faq_technical_q3_a3_highlight_item4: Tag: Maktabad yar oo fudud, oo ah maktabad isku-dhafan oo dhakhso leh
faq_technical_q3_a3_highlight_item6: C # /. Net: xirmo NuGET ayaa la heli karaa
faq_technical_q3_a4_list_item4: Isku-darka caado ee loogu talagalay aaladaha ganacsiga
faq_technical_q4_a2_highlight_item1: Macaamil ku habboon: Qulqulka lacag bixinta oo dhameystiran oo aan lacag dhab ah lahayn
faq_technical_q4_a2_highlight_item2: Tijaabada WebHayoks: Tijaabada webxaok iyo aaladaha dib-u-dejinta
faq_technical_q4_a2_highlight_item3: Xogta jeeska ah: Saxaafadda imtixaanka dhabta ah iyo kiisaska geeska
faq_compliance_a1: Sideed u xaqiijinaysaa u hoggaansanaanta qawaaniinta maaliyadeed?
faq_compliance_q1_a1_paragraph: Paycio waxay haysaa u hogaansanaan dhameystiran oo dhan dhammaan awoodaha hawlgalka:
faq_compliance_q1_a2_row0_col2: Baadhitaanka macaamil ganacsi ee waqtiga-dhabta ah
faq_compliance_q1_a3_item0: Baadhitaanka waqtiga-dhabta ah: Liisaska cunaqabataynta, xog ururinta PEP, warbaahinta ka xun
faq_compliance_q1_a3_item1: Korjoogteynta Macaamilka: Ogeysiinta Firfircoon ee Shakiga iyo Warbixinta
faq_compliance_q1_a3_item2: Warbixinta Sharciga: Warbixinta Ujuura ee otomaatiga ah ee loo hoggaansamo masuuliyiinta
faq_compliance_q1_a3_item3: Wadooyinka xisaab hubinta: Taariikhda Macaamiisha oo Dhameystiran iyo Diiwaangelinta
faq_compliance_a2: Tallaabooyin ammaan ah noocee ah ayaad ku leedahay?
faq_compliance_q2_a1_paragraph: SIYAASADA MADAXWEYNAHA GUUD EE DUGSIGA EE DHAMMAAN DHAMMAAN DHAMMAAN:
faq_compliance_q2_a2_item0: Encryption: AES-256 ENCHYPONTY SITE, TLS 1.3 ee Gaadiidka
faq_compliance_q2_a2_item1: Maareynta Muhiimka ah: Moodooyinka amniga qalabka (HSMS)
faq_compliance_q2_a2_item2: Amniga Shabakada: VPC, Furwalls, DDOS Ilaalinta
faq_compliance_q2_a2_item3: Xakamaynta Helitaanka: Xaqiijinta xubinta fikradaha badan, helitaanka doorka ku saleysan
faq_compliance_q2_a3_item0: Kaydinta qabow: 95% ee hantida Crypto ee kaydinta qabow ee qadka dhexe
faq_compliance_q2_a3_item2: Hantidhawrka joogtada ah: Hanti-dhowrka Amniga saddexaad iyo imtixaanka galmada
faq_compliance_q2_a3_item4: Caymiska: Mas'uuliyada Cyrab ee dhameystiran iyo caymiska dambiyada
faq_compliance_q2_a4_item1: PCI DSS Heerka 1 U hoggaansanaanta (meesha ay ku habboon tahay)
faq_compliance_q2_a4_item2: Hantidhawrka Amniga Dibadda ee Joogtada ah
faq_compliance_a3: Waa maxay waajibaadyadeyda u hoggaansan ee baayacmushtarka?
faq_compliance_q3_a1_paragraph: Shuruudaha u hoggaansanaanta ganacsiga waxay kuxirantahay awooda iyo nooca ganacsiga:
faq_compliance_q3_a2_item0: Aqoonsiga macmiilka: Ogow macmiilkaaga macaamil ganacsi sare
faq_compliance_q3_a2_item1: Diiwaangelinta Diiwaangelinta: Joogtee diiwaangelinta diiwaannada macaamiisha sida uu sharcigu farayo
faq_compliance_q3_a2_item2: Warbixinta: Ka warbixi howlaha laga shakiyo ee mas'uuliyiinta markii loo baahdo
faq_compliance_q3_a2_item3: U hoggaansanaanta canshuuraha: Soo sheeg Lacag bixinta Crypto ujeeddooyin canshuureed
faq_compliance_q3_a2_item4: Liisanka Ganacsiga: Joogtaynta rukhsadaha ganacsi ee ansax ah iyo diiwaangelinta
faq_compliance_q3_a3_item0: Warbixinta otomatiga ah: Warbixinnada macaamil ee qaabab loo baahan yahay
faq_compliance_q3_a3_item1: U hoggaansanaanta dashboard: Korjoogteynta heerka u hoggaansanaanta waqtiga-dhabta ah
faq_compliance_q3_a3_item2: Dukumiinti: Hindisaha ugu wanaagsan ee gargaarada kasta
faq_compliance_q3_a3_item3: Taageero Khabiir ah: La-tashiga U hoggaansanaanta iyo Hanuuninta
faq_compliance_q3_a3_item4: Is dhexgalka: Helitaanka API ee xogta u hoggaansanaanta ee nidaamkaaga
faq_compliance_q3_a4_paragraph: Waxaan bixinaa taageerada u hogaansanaanta iyo cusbooneysiinta sida qawaaniintu u egtahay.
faq_settlement_q1: Sidee dhakhso ah ayaan heli karaa lacagtayda?
faq_settlement_q1_a1_paragraph: Xilliyada dejinta waxay ku kala duwan yihiin heerka ganacsiga iyo habka dejinta:
faq_settlement_q1_a2_row2_col3: Adeegyada Khasnadda ayaa la heli karaa
faq_settlement_q1_a3_item0: Crypto Toos: Lacag si toos ah loogu diray cinwaankaaga jeebka
faq_settlement_q1_a3_item1: Beddelka Fiat: Digniinta tooska ah ee lacagta maxalliga ah
faq_settlement_q1_a3_item2: Stabcoin: USDC / USDT degitaanka qiimaha xasilloonida
faq_settlement_q2: Xarar lacago ah oo aad taageerto?
faq_settlement_q2_a1_paragraph: Pacio wuxuu taageeraa degitaanka lacagaha iyo qaababka badan:
faq_settlement_q2_a2_item0: Lacagta lacagaha waaweyn: USD, EUR, GBP, CAD, POS, JPY
faq_settlement_q2_a2_item1: Lacagaha Gobolka: SGD, HKD, CHF, SEK, NOK, et al
faq_settlement_q2_a2_item2: Suuqyada soo ifbaxaya: Brl, Mxn, INR, KRW (ballaarinta)
faq_settlement_q2_a2_item3: Bangiga maxalliga ah: Tooska bangiga tooska ah ee lacagaha gudaha
faq_settlement_q2_a3_item0: Dhalad-gobol ah: Ku hel lacag-bixinnada asalka ah ee qiimeynta asalka ah & taageerada ilaa 50 + lacagaha.
faq_settlement_q2_a3_item1: Statcatoins: USDC, USDT, Dai si ay ugu jirto xasilloonida
faq_settlement_q2_a3_item2: Is dhexgalka bulshada: Xallinta tooska ah ee loo dejiyo borotokoolka
faq_settlement_q3: Sideed ula dhaqmi kartaa isbeddelada heerka sarrifka?
faq_settlement_q3_a1_paragraph: Paycio waxay bixisaa xulashooyin badan si loo maareeyo khatarta sarrifka:
faq_settlement_q3_a2_item0: Dib-u-habeynta dib-u-dhaca: U beddelo waqtiga heshiiska
faq_settlement_q3_a2_item1: Xaddidaynta Xadka: U deji inta ugu yar ee sarrifka lacagaha ugu yar ee la aqbali karo
faq_settlement_q3_a4_paragraph: Qiimaha Ilo wareedyo: Waxaan iskucelcelisnaa kala-baxa isdhaafsiga badan iyo bixiyeyaasha dareeraha si loo hubiyo qiimeynta tartanka iyo sicirka ugu yar.
faq_support_q1: Waa maxay xulashooyinka taageerada la heli karo?
faq_support_q1_a1_paragraph: Heerka taageerada ayaa ku kala duwan tirka ganacsatada oo leh xulashooyinka kor u kaca ee la heli karo:
faq_support_q1_a3_item0: Dukumiintiyada horumariyaha: Tilmaamaha API-ga oo dhameystiran iyo casharrada
faq_support_q1_a3_item1: Madasha Bulshada: Taageerada Asxaabta iyo falanqaynta
faq_support_q1_a3_item2: Tilmaanta fiidiyowga: Tilmaamaha is dhexgalka talaabada
faq_support_q1_a3_item3: Webnars: Fadhiyada tababarka caadiga ah iyo cusbooneysiinta
faq_support_q1_a3_item4: Xaaladda Bogga: Nidaamka waqtiga-waqtiga-dhabta ah iyo cusboonaysiinta dayactirka
faq_support_q2: Maxaa dhacaya haddii ay jirto arrin farsamo ama nidaam xilligan?
faq_support_q2_a1_paragraph: Paycio waxay sii wadaysaa helitaan sare oo leh qorshe rasmi ah oo ku saabsan qorsheynta is-qorista:
faq_support_q2_a2_item0: Waqtiga SLA: 99.9% dammaanad-qaadista waqtiga (99.99% lacagta lagu bixiyo)
faq_support_q2_a2_item1: Dib-u-dhigid: Howlgallo badan oo loo dirayo guuldaradii tooska ah
faq_support_q2_a2_item2: Korjoogteynta: Korjoogteynta nidaamka waqtiga-dhabta ah iyo feejignaanta
faq_support_q2_a2_item4: Isgaarsiinta: Cusboonaysiinta firfircoon ee ku saabsan bogga heerka iyo ogeysiiska
faq_support_q2_a3_item0: Raadinta: Korjoogteyn otomaatig ah ayaa arrimaha daqiiqado ka muujisa arrimaha
faq_support_q2_a3_item1: Qiimaynta: Kooxda Farsamada ayaa qiimeysa saameynta iyo baaxadda
faq_support_q2_a3_item2: Isgaarsiinta: Bogga Xaaladda Cusboonaysiinta, baayacmushtarka saameeyay ayaa la ogeysiiyay
faq_support_q2_a3_item3: Xallinta: hagaajinta la geeyay cusbooneysiinta joogtada ah
faq_support_q2_a3_item4: Baaritaanka dhimashada ka dib: Falanqaynta faahfaahsan iyo tallaabooyinka ka hortagga
faq_support_q2_a4_paragraph: SIYAASADA DADWEYNAHA: Dhibcaha SL waxay bixisay hoos udhaca xaddiga badan ee la isku raacay.
faq_support_q3_a1_paragraph: Falanqayn dhameystiran iyo awoodaha warbixinta oo dhan dhammaan heerarka ganacsiga:
faq_support_q3_a3_item0: Falanqaynta Macaamilka Macaamilka: mugga, heerarka guusha, qaybinta juqraafi ahaaneed
faq_support_q3_a3_item1: Falanqaynta Dakhliga: Isbeddellada Dakhliga, Burburinta Lacagta, Falanqaynta Lacagta
faq_support_q3_a3_item2: Falanqaynta macaamiisha: dhaqanka macaamiisha, haynta, qiimaha nolosha
faq_support_q3_a3_item3: Falanqaynta khatarta ah: Baadhitaanka khayaanada, u hogaansanaanta martigelinta
faq_seapen_q1: Seapeen waxay ka fiirsaneysaa inay ku daraan lacag-bixinnada Crypto deegaanka.
faq_seapen_q1_a1_p1: Haa, waxaan wax ka qaban karnaa cabirka iyo shuruudaha badda ee badda oo waxaan kaa caawin karnaa inaad ka shaqeyso malaayiin macaamil ganacsi maalin kasta.
faq_seapen_q1_a1_l1: Kaabayaasha u go'an: Gelitaanka daruuriga ee gaarka loo leeyahay ee la dammaanad qaaday SLA
faq_seapen_q1_a1_l2: Qaab-dhismeedka Heerka Cupot: Qiimaha mugga ku saleysan ee ka bilaabmaya 0.8% mugga lacagta macaamiisha.
faq_seapen_q1_a1_l4: 24/7 Taageero u heellan: Kooxda Xisaabaadka iyo Khabiirada Farsamada.
faq_seapen_q1_a1_l5: U hoggaansanaanta sharciyeynta: U hoggaansanaanta buuxda ee dhammaan awoodaha hawlgalka.
faq_seapen_q2: Sidee tani u dhexgelin lahayd kaabayaashayada iyo lacagahayaga jira?
faq_seapen_q2_a1_p1: Waxaan abuuri lahayn is-dhexgal aan kala go 'lahayn oo dhameystiraya kaabayaashaada lacag bixinta ee jira.
faq_seapen_q2_a1_l1: Ku dar Crypto Ilo dhaqaale oo ay weheliso xulashooyinka kale ee bixinta.
faq_seapen_q2_a1_l2: U oggolow soo-saareyaasha inay aqbalaan bixinta lacagaha ee 'Crypto' iyada oo loo marayo madalkaaga.
faq_seapen_q2_a1_l3: Ku xir albaabkaaga lacag bixinta oo leh Paycio oo loogu talagalay soo bandhigida isku-dheelitirka ee 'Crypto isku dheelitirka'.
faq_seapen_q2_a1_l4: Mirror muraayaddaada lacag bixintaada ee hadda jirta ee isbeddelada ugu yar ee horumarinta.
faq_seapen_q2_a1_l5: Is dhexgalka ayaa noqon laheyd mid aan muuqan in la joojiyo isticmaaleyaasha;
faq_seapen_q3: Ka waran u hogaansanaanta iyo shuruudaha sharciyeynta oo ku baahsan howlaheena caalamiga ah?
faq_seapen_q3_a1_p1: Waxaan la macaamilaynaa u hoggaansanaanta awooda-qaan gaarka ah si otomaatig ah:
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l1: Ruqsadaha Caalamka: Waxaan ilaalinaa laysanka lacag bixinta meesha shirkaddaada ay ku shaqeyso.
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l2: U hoggaansanaanta otomaatiga ah: Waqtiga-waqtiga-waqtiga-waqtiga-KYC ee dhammaan macaamil ganacsiyada oo dhan.
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l3: Warbixinta Xirfada: warbixinno otomaatig ah oo loogu talagalay mas'uuliyiinta ay khusayso ee xukunka kasta.
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l4: Xogta Xogta: U hoggaansanaanta shuruudaha degenaanshaha xogta (EU, Shiinaha, iwm).
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l5: U hoggaansanaanta qarsoodiga: GDPR iyo qawaaniinta kale ee asturnaanta ayaa si buuxda loo taageeraa.
faq_seapen_q3_a1_l6: Kooxdayaga u hogaansanaanta ayaa si toos ah ula shaqeyn doonta kooxda sharciga ee badda si loo hubiyo isku-dhafan buuxa.
faq_seapen_q4: Sideed u maareyn lahayd mugdigayaga xawaaladda weyn?
faq_seapen_q4_a1_p1: Kaabayaashayada waxaa loogu talagalay in lagu maareeyo culeyska-ganacsiga-gawaarida
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l2: Imtixaanka Sare ee Imtixaanka: Tijaabada-ka-hor-ka-hor-dhac si loo hubiyo awoodda mugga la filayo.
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l3: Qorshaynta mudnaanta leh: khadkii ugu go'an ee macaamil ganacsi oo loogu talagalay macaamilkaaga.
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l4: Qaybinta juquraafi ahaan: Howlgalka gobol badan ee waxqabadka ugu habboon ee waxqabadka.
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l5: Korjoogteynta: Korjoogteynta waqtiga-dhabta ah ee kooxdaada inta lagu jiro munaasabadaha taraafikada sare.
faq_seapen_q4_a1_l6: Waxaan si guul leh uga qabannay mugga macaamil ganacsi ee guud, sida dhacdooyinka jimcaha ee madow ee loogu talagalay tafaariiqyada kale ee ugu waaweyn ee ka baaraandegida $ 100m + ee ku jira lacagaha Scptto maalinlaha ah.
faq_seapen_q5: Waa maxay qaab dhismeedka maaliyadeed ee iskaashi?
faq_seapen_q5_a1_p1: Waxaan bixin lahayn xirmo shirkadeed dhameystiran.
faq_seapen_q5_a1_t_row_0_col_2: Si weyn uga hooseeyso howsha bixinta lacagaha dhaqameedyada
faq_seapen_q5_a1_t_row_1_col_2: Taageero farsamo oo buuxa iyo horumarin caadada ah ayaa lagu daray
faq_seapen_q5_a1_t_row_2_col_2: Kaabayaasha Kaabayaasha ah ee u go'ay iyo Kooxda Taageerada
faq_seapen_q5_a1_h1: Falanqaynta ROI: oo ku saleysan muggaaga lacag bixinta, waxaa lagu qiyaasaa $ 50-100m marka loo eego howsha bixinta mushaharka, oo lagu daro dakhli cusub oo ka socda macaamiisha 'Crypto'.

faq_seapen_q7: Sideed u xaqiijin lahayd heerarka amniga iyo asturnaanta ee ay macaamiisheena filanayaan?
faq_seapen_q7_a1_p1: Amniga iyo asturnaanta waa muhiim, oo waxaan la kulmi doonnaa heerarka hogaaminta warshadaha badda:
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l1: Qaabeeca aqoonta aqoonta eber-aqoonta: MARNA ma kaydin karno furayaasha gaarka ah ee 'Crypto' ee gaarka loo leeyahay ee Crypto.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l2: ENCRON-dhamaadka-dhamaadka-dhamaadka: Dhammaan xogta lacag-bixinta ayaa ku qarxay heerarka badda.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l3: Asturnaanta by naqshadeynta: xog aruurinta macluumaadka ugu yar, siyaasadaha tirtirka otomaatigga ah.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l4: Xaqiijinta biometric: Isdhaxgalka leh sawirka faraha ama id id ee oggolaanshaha lacag bixinta.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l6: Asturnaanta kaladuwan: Falanqaynta ka ilaaliya asturnaanta isticmaaleha shaqsiyeed.
faq_seapen_q7_a1_l7: Dhammaan hirgelinta amniga waxaa lagu qaadi lahaa nidaamka dib u eegista amniga ee badda ee badda iyo xisaabinta joogtada ah.
faq_seapen_q8: Maxaa taageero joogto ah iyo dayactir ay helayaan badda?
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l1: Kooxda Koontada Xisaabta: Maareeyaha xiriirka ee xidhiidhka, hogaaminta farsamada, iyo khabiirka u hogaansanaanta.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l2: 24/7 Taageerada: Khadka dheeraadka ah ee sii kordhaya oo leh 15 daqiiqo oo jawaab celin ah oo loogu talagalay arrimaha muhiimka ah.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l3: Dib-u-eegista Ganacsiga Quarterly: Fadhiyada Qorsheynta Istaraatiijiyadeed iyo Falanqaynta Waxqabadka.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l4: Horumarinta mudnaanta: Horumarinta muuqaalka caadiga ah iyo xoojinta api.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l5: Cusboonaysiinta Sharci-dejinta: Cusboonaysiinta Ujeeddooyinka Firfircoon ee Awoodda ah ee Sharciga Dhacdooyinka.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l6: Kordhinta Waxqabadka: Korjoogteynta isdaba joog ah iyo kobcinta macaamil ganacsi.
faq_seapen_q8_a1_l7: Intaas waxaa sii dheer, marin u helka kooxdayaga fulinta iyo guddiga ee wadahadalada iskaashiga istiraatiijiyadeed.
